title: Just Recieved a gift or so it said.
body: Hey I just got a little pop up that said I received a gift.... I didn't catch 1) what it was for/who it was from and 2) What it was. Is there some way in client I can check gift history or am I just stuck not knowing?

replies.body: You should be able to view gifts received through the client's store purchase history panel.  Looking into this for you, it looks like you received SKT Alistar from a friend.  Grats! :D
